Create a virtual reality experience that allows users to explore different eras of music history and interact with instruments and performers from those times.
Develop an app that uses artificial intelligence to analyze and recreate lost songs based on existing recordings and historical data.
Use 3D printing technology to create replicas of lost instruments and use them to perform new interpretations of classic songs.
Organize a series of concerts featuring live performances of lost compositions by famous composers, performed by modern musicians using period instruments.
Create a community-driven platform where musicians and fans can collaborate to preserve and restore lost recordings, and share their discoveries with others.
